introduction.section1: Traveling to the Land of the Rising Sun means discovering a mix of modernity and tradition. Uncover the cultural heritage of the temples and castles. Admire the fascinating changes of scenery depending on the season. Discover bustling cities and neighborhoods, or just relax in an onsen.
introduction.section2: Follow our city-to-city guide to discover our selection of must-see places. From Tokyo to Osaka via the famous city of Kyoto or Mount Fuji. Even Hokkaid≈ç Island and its multiple parks and volcanoes.
introduction.section3: We let you find through our articles and our photos, the magic of Japan, for the moment during spring, but we will share more about Japan during fall and winter very soon, so stay tuned.
